typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulementwithIndex
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		dd as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_avoir as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoirwithIndex
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> referentielATC
source(output(
		{Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		article as string,
		prix_unitaire_std as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
RenameLeft derive(ca_final = toDouble(ca_ecoulement),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_ecc ),
		data_origin = "ecoulement",
		id_canal_final = 42) ~> caFinal
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = columnChoiceEcoulement@yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLeft
fullLeft filter(isNull(renameAvoir@indexcols2)) ~> outerLeft
ecoulementwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2,
		qte_ecc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoiceEcoulement
avoirwithIndex select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameAvoir
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerAvoir
innerAvoir derive(canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP", 
    iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		year = {Année},
		month = Mois) ~> canal
canal derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45, 
    iif(canal=="FS", 51, 
    iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		ca_final = toDouble(qte_avoir)*toDouble(ca_avoir),
		qt_final = toInteger(qte_avoir)) ~> idCanal
idCanal derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", 'Diffus'),
		data_origin = "ecoulement_retraité") ~> idCanalFinal
stgOffre select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre = Offre,
		{ATC Performance} = CodeATC,
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(NoOffre,
		{ATC Performance}),
	Canal = max(Canal)) ~> uniqueOffre
idCanalFinal, uniqueOffre join(renameAvoir@NoOffre == uniqueOffre@NoOffre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftOffre
dropColumns select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndInner
caFinal, EndInner union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final==43, "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id = marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> keepColumns
referentielATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> atcKeepingColumn
DerivedColumn4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> atcNotNull
atcNotNull aggregate(groupBy(code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		Marque),
	ATC = max(ATC),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> uniqueATC
DerivedColumn3, uniqueATC join({Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftATC
dropColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumn
facturation derive(qt_cd_e = toInteger(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		qt_livr_e = toInteger(qt_livr_e),
		qt_factur_e = toInteger(qt_factur_e),
		ca_livr_ = toDouble(ca_livr_),
		ca_factur_ = toDouble(ca_factur_)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth),
	qt_cd_e = sum(qt_cd_e),
		ca_cd_ = sum(ca_cd_),
		qt_livr_e = sum(qt_livr_e),
		ca_livr_ = sum(ca_livr_),
		qt_factur_e = sum(qt_factur_e),
		ca_factur_ = sum(ca_factur_),
		{Canal distribution} = first({Canal distribution}),
		{Org commerciale} = first({Org commerciale}),
		{recept de march} = first({recept de march})) ~> Aggregate2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		article = reference,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e = qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_ = ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e = qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_ = ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e = qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_ = ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> aggFacturation
keepColumns aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur),
	Sum_ca_ecoulement = sum(toDouble(ca_ecoulement)),
		Sum_qte_ecoulement = sum(toDouble(qte_ecoulement)),
		marque_id = first(marque_id),
		id_canal_final = first(id_canal_final),
		canal_final = first(canal_final)) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3, aggFacturation join(reference == article
	&& Aggregate3@yearmonth == aggFacturation@yearmonth
	&& Aggregate3@HubSAPid == aggFacturation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerFacturation
fullLeftOffre select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_ecc,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid = columnChoiceEcoulement@HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		indexcols2 = columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		ca_avoir,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		canal = canal@canal,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		data_origin,
		{ATC Performance},
		NoOffre = renameAvoir@NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
fullLeftATC select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		{ATC Performance},
		code_postal_atc,
		{Canal final},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns1
tempOrigin2, aggFacturation join(reference == article
	&& Aggregate3@HubSAPid == aggFacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Aggregate3@yearmonth == aggFacturation@yearmonth,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftFacturation
innerFacturation derive(qt_plateforme_final = toDouble(Sum_qt_factur_e) - toDouble(Sum_qte_ecoulement),
		ca_plateforme_final = Sum_ca_factur_ -  Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		data_origin = "facturation decrementé",
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		{Canal final} = aggFacturation@id_canal_final) ~> newColumns1
Aggregate2 derive(tempOrigin = "facturation",
		{Canal distribution} = 42) ~> DerivedColumn2
Aggregate3 derive(tempOrigin = "ecoulement") ~> tempOrigin2
leftFacturation filter(isNull(tempOrigin2@tempOrigin)) ~> facturationOnly
facturationColFilter derive(qt_plateforme_final = toDouble(Sum_qt_factur_e),
		ca_plateforme_final = Sum_ca_factur_,
		data_origin = "facturation",
		marque_name = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> newColumns2
newColumns2 select(mapColumn(
		reference = article,
		distributeur,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_code = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name,
		POSSAMidString = {recept de march},
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EndunJoinedFacturation
Select2 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		marque_id,
		HubSAPid = {recept de march},
		id_canal_final = {Canal final},
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInerEcouFact
EndunJoinedFacturation, endInerEcouFact union(byName: true)~> UnionendInerEcouFact
idCanalFinal1 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		distributeur,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_code,
		marque_name,
		POSSAMidString,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		marque_id = marque_code,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
renameColumn, endDecrementation union(byName: true)~> UnionEndDecrementation
getNotNullValue select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		marque_id,
		marque_name,
		NoOffre,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		CompanyId,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin,
		id_canal_final,
		{Canal final},
		{ATC Performance},
		{code postal} = getNotNullValue@{code postal},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns3
UnionEndDecrementation derive(marque_id = coalesce(marque_id , marque_code),
		id_canal_final = coalesce(id_canal_final ),
		{Canal final} = coalesce({Canal final} , canal_final),
		{code postal} = coalesce(code_postal_atc , {Code postal})) ~> getNotNullValue
aggFacturation filter(toInteger({recept de march})==16012598 && toInteger(article)==10017388 && instr(yearmonth, "2020")>0) ~> Filter2
Filter2 aggregate(sq = sum(Sum_qt_factur_e)) ~> Aggregate4
UnionendunJoinedEcoulement derive(id_canal_final = toInteger(id_canal_final)) ~> idCanalFinal1
facturationOnly select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		distributeur,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		tempOrigin = tempOrigin2@tempOrigin,
		article,
		HubSAPid = aggFacturation@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = aggFacturation@yearmonth,
		id_canal_final = aggFacturation@id_canal_final,
		{Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> facturationColFilter
Aggregate3 derive(tempOrigin = "ecoulement") ~> tempOrigin
tempOrigin, aggFacturation join(reference == article
	&& Aggregate3@HubSAPid == aggFacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Aggregate3@yearmonth == aggFacturation@yearmonth,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFacturation
JoinFacturation filter(isNull(aggFacturation@tempOrigin)) ~> ecoulementOnlt
ecoulementOnlt select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = Aggregate3@yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid = Aggregate3@HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		ca_plateforme_final = Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		qt_plateforme_final = Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = Aggregate3@id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumns2 derive(data_origin = "decrementation ecoulement sans matching",
		ca_plateforme_final = -1*toDouble(ca_plateforme_final),
		qt_plateforme_final = -toDouble(qt_plateforme_final)) ~> newColumns
newColumns select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endunJoinedEcoulement
UnionendInerEcouFact, endunJoinedEcoulement union(byName: true)~> UnionendunJoinedEcoulement
columnChoiceEcoulement, renameAvoir join(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2 == renameAvoir@indexcols2,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAvoir
JoinAvoir filter(isNull(columnChoiceEcoulement@indexcols2)) ~> FilterIndexCols2
FilterIndexCols2 select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = renameAvoir@HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth = renameAvoir@yearmonth,
		POSid,
		indexcols2 = renameAvoir@indexcols2,
		qte_avoir
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoice
renameAvoir filter((CompanyId=="7") && ({Année}=="2020")) ~> Filter7
Filter7 aggregate(Qte_Validee_VGF = sum(toInteger(qte_avoir))) ~> Aggregate8
uniqueATC filter(code_postal_atc==3300) ~> Filter8
fullLeftATC filter({Code postal}==3300) ~> Filter9
keepColumns derive({Code postal} = toInteger({Code postal})) ~> DerivedColumn3
atcKeepingColumn derive(code_postal_atc = toInteger(code_postal_atc)) ~> DerivedColumn4
newColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth = Aggregate3@yearmonth,
		reference,
		HubSAPid = Aggregate3@HubSAPid,
		distributeur,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement,
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = Aggregate3@id_canal_final,
		canal_final,
		article,
		HubSAPid = aggFacturation@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = aggFacturation@yearmonth,
		id_canal_final = aggFacturation@id_canal_final,
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		{recept de march},
		Sum_qt_cd_e,
		Sum_ca_cd_,
		Sum_qt_livr_e,
		Sum_ca_livr_,
		Sum_qt_factur_e,
		Sum_ca_factur_,
		tempOrigin,
		qt_plateforme_final,
		ca_plateforme_final,
		data_origin,
		{Canal final}
